title: His Excellency Mohammad bin Abdullah Al Gergawi | World Government Summit

roles.title: Managing Director of the World Governments Summit Organization
quotes: H.E. Omar Sultan Al Olama, Minister of State for Artificial Intelligence, Digital Economy and Remote Work Applications in the UAE, and Managing Director of the World Governments Summit Organization

Al Gergawi has been the recipient of numerous honors, recognitions and academic degrees, most notably the honorary doctorate in government management and future strategies from the ESCP Business School in Paris, the Moroccan Royal Order of Merit from His Majesty King Mohammed VI of Morocco, and the American Business Award.

Al Gergawi has been the recipient of numerous honors, recognitions and academic degrees, most notably the honorary doctorate in government management and future strategies from the ESCP Business School in Paris, the Moroccan Royal Order of Merit from His Majesty King Mohammed VI of Morocco, and the American Business Award.

In 2017, His Excellency was named the Federal Personality of the Year by His Highness Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi and Deputy Supreme Commander of the UAE Armed Forces.
H.E. Al Gergawi holds a bachelorâ€™s degree from the United States.
